resources.string: Welcome, this is your penguin colony. Log your meals and start saving the penguins today!
Your positive impact on the penguin colony is low.
Your penguin colony is decreasing warningly!
Keep Going! You\'re eating local and healthy.
You\'re on a good way, but you can do better! Add more local veggies and fruit to your meal.
Oh Dear! Try to eat healty and local to save the penguins.
